revised_title: Solar Corona Analysis Using Spherical Harmonics
tldr: This article presents a summary of a memoir discussing the solar corona using spherical harmonics. The author, F. H. Bigelow, analyzes photographs of the corona taken during a total solar eclipse in January 1889. The article also acknowledges the valuable advice and criticism provided by Milnes Marshall and the communication by Sir James Paget, F.R.S.
